subject: Dear xxx,
body:
Dear xxx,
Please see attached important documents for your reference.
Thanks,
Best regards.
Peter M Olusegun Agada.
For: Director General

subject: Re: Dear xxx,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sending over these documents. I appreciate your effort in sharing this information with me. 

Could you please provide a brief summary or key points of the attached documents? This would help me to better understand their content and relevance.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lovie
